PERSONA:
meet alex, a 35-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the west coast. alex is a well-educated individual, having earned a postgraduate degree and works in a professional field that allows him to earn a comfortable middle-class income between $90,000 and $100,000 per year.

born and raised in the united states, alex has never been married and identifies as an atheist, seldom attending religious services. politically, he considers himself an independent voter, though he leans towards the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views on most issues.

in his free time, alex enjoys staying connected through frequent internet use, almost constantly being online. however, he doesn't currently participate in any volunteer work or community service activities.

alex is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously, ensuring that he is properly registered at his current address. while he may not be actively involved in political campaigns or organizations, he values the democratic process and exercises his right to vote.

overall, alex leads a comfortable life as an educated, middle-class professional in a metropolitan area of the west coast. he values his independence, both personally and politically, and enjoys the conveniences of modern technology while maintaining a balanced approach to his ideological beliefs and civic engagement.
